item.title: Keras: Multiple outputs and multiple losses
item.description: A multiple outputs model has several fully connected layers for output. Each layer is responsible for performing a specific task and has a respective loss function and activation function.

item.title: Multi-label classification with Keras
item.description: The post introduces how to do multi-label classification with Keras and implements a simple model with custom SmallerVGGNet can predict both color and clothing type of input image.

item.title: Exploring Spatiotemporal Features for Activity Classifications in Films
item.description: The post introduces several experiments about activity classification based on three main architectures: 3D CNN, ConvLSTM2D, and a pipeline of pre-trained CNN-LSTM.

item.title: Video Classification in Keras using ConvLSTM
item.description: This article will explain the Deep Learning based solution of the Video Classification task in Keras using ConvLSTM layers.

item.title: Introduction to Video Classification and Human Activity Recognition
item.description: In this post, we will learn about Video Classification. We will go over a number of approaches to make a video classifier for Human Activity Recognition. Basically, you will learn video classification and human activity recognition.
